original_text: The apostles all came to Jesus. They told him about all the things that they had done. And they told him what they had taught.
korean_text: 사도들이 예수께 모여 자기들이 행한 것과 가르친 것을 낱낱이 고하니

sentences.original_text: The apostles all came to Jesus
They told him about all the things that they had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 행한 모든 일을 그분께 말씀드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: And they told him what they had taught
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신들이 가르친 내용을 그분께 말씀드렸습니다
